attributes.action: Add Radio Music On Public Transportation
attributes.additional_details: To give the public a calming or additionally interesting time on transport for those who lack a means for their own entertainment.
attributes.background: Add speakers on Busses, Trains and ect. to allow the radio to be played. As someone who has no entertainment when I am alone on the bus I get really bored.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for individual operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
